DOC.brief_summary: Subjects with Clostridium Difficile Infection (CDI) are randomized and then treated with study drug for 10 days. At the end of treatment, cure is assessed; subjects are then followed-up to assess any disease recurrence.
DOC.brief_title: ACT-179811 in Patients With Clostridium Difficile Infection
DOC.criteria: male or female at least 18 year old CDI 1st occurrence or 1st recurrence concurrent life threatening condition concomitant antimicrobial treatment for CDI concomitant treatment with another investigational drug.
